nodes.description: Business area covering operational processes and back-office functions

nodes.description: Managing comprehensive customer relationships and interactions across all touchpoints

nodes.name: Contact Center Management
nodes.description: Managing contact center operations including call routing, agent management and service delivery

nodes.name: Product Portfolio Management
nodes.description: Strategic management of the complete product portfolio including performance analysis and optimization

nodes.name: Product Development & Design
nodes.description: End-to-end product development from concept to market launch including design and testing

nodes.name: Customer Case Management
nodes.description: Comprehensive management of customer issues, complaints and service requests with full lifecycle tracking

nodes.name: Product Design & Development
nodes.description: Service for designing, developing and testing new banking products from conception to market readiness

nodes.name: Initiate Payment Order
nodes.description: POST /payment-orders - Creates new payment order with beneficiary details and amount

nodes.name: Authorize Payment
nodes.description: POST /payment-orders/{orderId}/authorize - Authorizes payment after validation and security checks

nodes.name: Execute Payment
nodes.description: POST /payment-orders/{orderId}/execute - Executes authorized payment through appropriate payment rails

nodes.name: Get Payment Status
nodes.description: GET /payment-orders/{orderId}/status - Retrieves current payment status and transaction details

nodes.name: Initiate Customer Case
nodes.description: POST /customer-cases - Creates new customer case with initial details and assigns case ID

nodes.name: Update Customer Case
nodes.description: PUT /customer-cases/{caseId} - Updates existing customer case with new information or status changes

nodes.name: Retrieve Customer Case
nodes.description: GET /customer-cases/{caseId} - Retrieves complete customer case details including history and current status

nodes.name: Resolve Customer Case
nodes.description: POST /customer-cases/{caseId}/resolve - Marks customer case as resolved with resolution details

nodes.name: Initiate Product Development
nodes.description: POST /product-development - Initiates new product development project with specifications and requirements

nodes.name: Update Product Design
nodes.description: PUT /product-development/{productId} - Updates product design specifications and development status

nodes.name: Evaluate Product Performance
nodes.description: GET /product-development/{productId}/evaluation - Retrieves product performance metrics and evaluation results

nodes.name: Launch Product
nodes.description: POST /product-development/{productId}/launch - Launches product to market with go-live procedures

nodes.name: Payment Order Initiated
nodes.description: Event triggered when new payment order is created and enters processing pipeline

nodes.name: Payment Authorized
nodes.description: Event triggered when payment order receives authorization approval

nodes.name: Payment Executed
nodes.description: Event triggered when payment is successfully executed and funds transferred

nodes.name: Payment Failed
nodes.description: Event triggered when payment execution fails with error details and reason codes

nodes.name: Customer Case Created
nodes.description: Event triggered when new customer case is created - payload includes case details and customer information

nodes.name: Customer Case Assigned
nodes.description: Event triggered when customer case is assigned to specific agent or department

nodes.name: Customer Case Resolved
nodes.description: Event triggered when customer case is marked as resolved with resolution details

nodes.name: Customer Case Escalated
nodes.description: Event triggered when customer case is escalated to higher level support or management

nodes.name: Product Development Initiated
nodes.description: Event triggered when new product development project is started

nodes.name: Product Development Milestone
nodes.description: Event triggered when product development reaches key milestone or phase completion

nodes.name: Product Design Approved
nodes.description: Event triggered when product design receives approval for next development phase

nodes.name: Product Launched
nodes.description: Event triggered when product is successfully launched to market

nodes.name: Payment Instruction & Validation
nodes.description: Business object model defining payment instruction structure, validation rules and processing requirements

nodes.name: Payment Settlement & Reconciliation
nodes.description: Business object model for payment settlement procedures, reconciliation processes and exception handling

nodes.name: Customer Case Resolution Procedure
nodes.description: Business object model defining the structured procedure for handling customer cases from initiation to resolution

nodes.name: Customer Case Analysis
nodes.description: Business object model for analyzing customer case patterns, root causes and service improvement opportunities

nodes.name: Product Development Specification
nodes.description: Business object model containing detailed product specifications, requirements and design parameters

nodes.name: Product Testing & Validation
nodes.description: Business object model for product testing procedures, validation criteria and quality assurance processes

edges.label: depends on
edges.description: Payment authorization may create customer case for manual review or exceptions

edges.label: triggers
edges.description: Failed payment events automatically trigger customer case creation for investigation

edges.label: implements
edges.description: Salesforce CRM implements customer case management capabilities

edges.label: implements
edges.description: ServiceNow handles internal IT service cases overlapping with customer cases

edges.label: implements
edges.description: Payment gateway system implements payment order processing

edges.label: implements
edges.description: Core banking system handles account validation and settlement for payments

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Customer experience team owns and maintains Salesforce CRM system

edges.label: owns
edges.description: CRM platform team manages ServiceNow configuration and integrations

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Payments platform team owns payment gateway system

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Core banking team maintains legacy core banking system

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Customer service business team owns customer relationship business domain

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Payments business team owns payment initiation business domain

edges.label: owns
edges.description: Product management business team owns product development business domain

edges.label: leads
edges.description: Head of customer service leads customer service business team

edges.label: leads
edges.description: Head of payments leads payments business team

edges.label: leads
edges.description: Head of product management leads product management business team

edges.label: collaborates_with
edges.description: Customer service business team collaborates with customer experience dev team

edges.label: collaborates_with
edges.description: Payments business team collaborates with payments platform dev team

edges.label: influences
edges.description: Product management business team influences customer experience development priorities

edges.label: hosts
edges.description: Salesforce CRM system hosts the case initiation API endpoint

edges.label: publishes
edges.description: Salesforce CRM publishes case created events to event bus

edges.label: hosts
edges.description: Payment gateway system hosts payment initiation API

edges.label: publishes
edges.description: Payment gateway publishes payment executed events

edges.label: integrates_with
edges.description: Payment gateway integrates with core banking for account validation

edges.label: governs
edges.description: Risk policies govern lending decisions but no direct API calls

edges.label: shares data with
edges.description: Both access customer account data from shared database
